properties.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Casper Mountain
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 6 at 3:44PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
Narrow, northwest-southeast oriented bands of snow will occur
through midnight tonight across Natrona County. These snow bands
will be very localized in nature. It appears that the most
snowfall from these snow bands will be concentrated across western
Natrona County, as well as across Casper Mountains, where one to
three inches of snow will accumulate in some areas, over a
relatively short period of time. Less snowfall will likely fall
in most other areas.

Travelers should anticpate rapidly fluctuating visibility along
with changing road conditions where highways become rapidly slick
and snow covered. Much of this snowfall will likely diminish by
midnight.
